description.en_US: This a sink plugin for Sql based Database, it can be used for saving the analysis data into Sql based database.
description.zh_CN: 本插件为 SQL Database 的持久化插件，可以用于将分析数据存入支持 SQL 语法的数据库中

hint.en_US: The url of the database, it is important to note that the password in the URL is url-encoded characters, and you need to re-enter the password when editing. For example, the database address of mysql is mysql://username:password@127.0.0.1:3306/testdb?parseTime=true, if the original password is 123:#?, the password here should be filled in with 123%3A%23%3F
hint.zh_CN: 数据库服务器的 URL，需要特别注意的是 URL 中的密码为 url 编码后的字符，并且编辑时需要重新输入密码。例如，mysql 的数据库地址为 mysql://username:password@127.0.0.1:3306/testdb?parseTime=true，若原始密码为 123:#?，则这里的 password 应填入 123%3A%23%3F

hint.en_US: Tag fields written to the database
hint.zh_CN: 写入数据库的标签字段
